thread.title: All-time top scorer: Watch Real Madrid special tribute to record man Cristiano Ronaldo
thread.title_full: All-time top scorer: Watch Real Madrid special tribute to record man Cristiano Ronaldo

title: All-time top scorer: Watch Real Madrid special tribute to record man Cristiano Ronaldo
text:
18:55 CET All-time top scorer: Watch Real Madrid special tribute to record man Cristiano Ronaldo - www.allsports.com.gh 
Real Madrid have been celebrating the fact that Cristiano Ronaldo has become the club's all-time leading scorer. 
According to the club, Ronaldo scored his 324th goal for Madrid on Wednesday night against Malmo. As noted by BBC Sport, however, official statistics indicate he is actually still level with Raul on 323. 
"The confusion centres around a goal scored in September 2010," the report states. "The Spanish giants credit Ronaldo with a free-kick scored against Real Sociedad, despite the fact the effort was deflected in by team-mate Pepe, who was given the goal by La Liga." 
Either way, the record has been broken or is about to be, and to celebrate, Real have published a tribute video on YouTube showing off Ronaldo's greatest moments in a white shirt. 
There were certainly many to choose from. Credit: Bleacher Report
